views.markdown:
Updated for iOS 11 support - Minor UI improvements
- Some iOS 9-related bug fixes

-Fixed iOS9 Recents view inside Phone.app not searching for contact info online. - Updated with iOS 8.3 support - Fixed a crash issue when pressing the + button in the phone.app dialer
- Added iOS 8 full Compatibility
- Added CallerID Recognition for outgoing calls too.
- Fixes an issue where numbers with prefix +30 were not correctly checked on the database during an incoming call.

- Fixes phone.app keypad not displaying existing contacts names when typing their number
- Fixes earlier version of CallBar crashing when activating the dialer interface.

- Added support for the upcoming CallBar v3
- Fixed an issue that randomly crashed inside phone applcation's dialer when typing numbers.
- Fixed an issue where the 'checking number' message disappeared from the phone.app dialer immediately.
- Memory usage fixes
- Added full support for iPhone 5S and iOS 7

- Added iOS 7 support
- Changed icons to iOS7 style
- Fixed an iOS6 issue where the Phone.app's dialer field didn't show results for the typed number
- Fixed an iOS6 issue where the Phone.app crashed when you pressed the Dialer's add contact button.
- Added option to automatically save the identified incoming call number
- Added ability to type a number on the dial keypad in Phone.app and check who it belongs to
- Added ability to check a number from Recents and see who it belongs to and/or save it as a contact.
- Minor fixes
- Fixed settings not displaying

- Fixed an issue where it would crash in some device upon receiving a call

- Fixed an issue where settings options didn't display in Settings.app
